ModMetaData.name: [T] More Floors Wool Cloth Patch
ModMetaData.author: nercury
ModMetaData.description:
Patches "More Floors" mod to add wool cloth recipe from Woolly Rhino, Argali, Camel or Musk ox wool.
Do not install if you don't have More Floors mod or listed animals. This is just a small patch that allows manufacturing wool cloth from more wool types. It does not add wool, the "[T] More Floors" mod does.
It's not necesary to have all these animal mods, only the loaded mods will be patched.
Patched animals:
- Woolly Rhino, ReGrowth: Extinct Animals Pack (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2266685892) - Argali, Erin's Mountain Animals (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2250773505) - Camel, Vanilla Animals Expanded — Extreme Desert (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1849184079) - Musk ox, Vanilla Animals Expanded — Tundra (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895364585)
[T] More Floors mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1543561093
